job title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer for a Global Consumer Device company
job description:
JOB DESCRIPTION:
Seeking a Senior Machine Learning Engineer for a Global Consumer Device company in San Jose, CA

Our Client is looking for a software engineer who will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies for future generation of display systems and devices. As a software engineer, you will help to build the next generation of machine learning systems by designing novel algorithms to solve computer vision and machine learning problems.

Responsibilities:
  • Participate in cutting-edge research in machine learning and computer vision applications.
  • Apply expert software development skills to a wide range of ML-related coding projects.
  • Develop solutions for real-world problems.
Must Have Skillsets:
  • MS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or a related technical discipline.
  • 3+ years of experience in software development with machine learning and/or computer vision.
  • Expertise and experience in computer vision (feature extraction, segmentation, color, shape and texture analysis, object detection).
  • Excellent programming skills for python and C++.
  • Prior working experience in one of deep learning frameworks, such as PyTorch, Caffe(2), Tensorflow, etc.
  • Proven track record of achieving significant results.
Desired Skillsets:
  • 2+ years of experience applying machine learning to solving real-world problems.
  • Experience in OpenCV, and/or scikit-learn.
  • Experience working with large volumes of real-world noisy image data.
  • Specific computer vision skills in object detection, and classification is plus.
Type: 6+ months
Location: San Jose, CA
